lyrics.stanza: Simply loving everyday; Loving through a stormy way, Even when my faith is small, Loving Jesus, that is all.
Loving as the moments fly, Loving as the days go by, Loving Him whate'er befall, Loving Jesus, that is all.
Brightly doth His Spirit shine Into this poor heart of mine; While He leads I cannot fall, Loving Jesus, that is all.
Singing if my way be clear, Praying if the path be drear; If in danger, for Him call, Loving Jesus, that is all.
Loving Him while life shall last, Loving Him till earth is past, Till His gracious advent call, Loving Jesus, that is all.
